question: On which date, the 2019 National Panchayati Raj Day (NPRD) is celebrated in India?
explanation: The National Panchayati Raj Day (NPRD) is celebrated every year in India on April 24 by the Ministry of Panchayati Raj. It is also known as the National Local Self-Government day.  On this day, in 1993, the 73rd  Constitution Amendment Act of 1992 came into force that has institutionalized Panchayati Raj through the village, Intermediate and District level Panchayats.
